wikitext.*:
'''Vanimelda''' is the highest word for praise of beauty in [[Quenya]]. It meant at once both "beautiful and beloved" and "Elven-fair".<ref name="pe17">{{PE|17}}, pp. 56</ref>

It was used within the name of [[Arwen]] (''Arwen Vanimelda Elerondiel'').<ref name="pe17" /> It was the basis for the name of [[Vanimeldë]].

==Etymology==
''Vanimelda'' had two distinct etymologies. The first is a compound of ''vanima'' ("beautiful") + ''melda'' ("beloved"). The second is a compound of ''vanima'' + ''elda'' ("Elf"); or "fair as an Elf".

== Cognates==
The [[Sindarin]] cognate was ''edhelvein''.<ref name="pe17" />
